Ukrainian soldiers expect more assaults after Russian forces capture eastern townUkrainian soldiers dug in around new positions outside of Avdiivka say Russian forces who captured the eastern Ukrainian town last week are pressing on toward nearby towns and villages. Wed, 21 Feb 2024 23:19:07 GMT IPRIGA34Q5K57JKAAO5A6PNBYA https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ukrainian-soldiers-expect-more-assaults-after- Russian-forces-capture-eastern-2024-02-21/Inna Varenytsia世界欧洲
Canada summons Russian ambassador, calls for full inquiry into Navalny's deathCanada on Wednesday summoned Russia's ambassador over the death of Alexei Navalny in Russian custody and called on the Kremlin to conduct a full and transparent inquiry into the death and to immediately release his body to his family, a government spokesperson said. Wed, 21 Feb 2024 22:40:13 GMT YRFJMRCHEFNQDP4KVXPJKTDPSY https://www.reuters.com/world/canada-summons- Russian-ambassador-calls-full-inquiry-into-navalnys-death-2024-02-21/Reuters世界
Yellen to visit Brazil for G20 meeting, Chile for bilateral talksU.S. Treasury Secretary Janet Yellen will join finance officials from the Group of 20 major economies for meetings in Sao Paolo, Brazil next week, and then travel on to Santiago, Chile for bilateral engagements, the Treasury said on Wednesday. Wed, 21 Feb 2024 22:31:43 GMT E2C6AL5HUBO7BNCDCDNSJBVKTM https://www.reuters.com/world/yellen-visit-brazil-g20-meeting-chile-bilingual-talks-2024-02-21/Andrea Shalal世界
Ecuador judge rules suspect is person of interest over storming of TV stationA judge in Ecuador on Wednesday authorized the inclusion of an alleged gang leader as a person of interest in the investigation into the violent storming of a television station last month, the attorney general's office said. Wed, 21 Feb 2024 22:20:33 GMT KMJMOUPCYFLKNJRNL5ZXFGSASU https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/ecuador-judge-rules-suspect-is-person-interest-over-storming-tv-station-2024-02-21/Reuters世界美洲
United Airlines to become first US carrier to resume Israel flights since Gaza warUnited Airlines said on Wednesday it plans to resume direct U.S. flights to Israel early next month, becoming the first American carrier to resume service since the Oct. 7 attack by Hamas militants on southern Israel. Wed, 21 Feb 2024 22:04:21 GMT VPTYBN62QVON3JFNWKH5K2AR3Q https://www.reuters.com/world/united-airlines-become-first-us-carrier-resume-israel-flights-since-gaza-war-2024-02-21/David Shepardson世界
Ukraine, IMF working toward deal on $890 million disbursement, source saysInternational Monetary Fund officials are negotiating with Ukrainian officials in Warsaw, Poland this week about a follow-on disbursement of $890 million from the country's $15.6 billion loan, a source familiar with the process said on Wednesday. Wed, 21 Feb 2024 21:29:26 GMT 2J5IAAO4PVOBDFQIQ24XC6QJIM https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ukraine-imf-working-toward-deal-890-million-disbursement-source-says-2024-02-21/Reuters世界欧洲
UK parliament descends into chaos over Gaza ceasefire voteDozens of lawmakers stormed out of Britain's parliament on Wednesday with tempers flaring as the three biggest political parties sought to outmanoeuvre each other over a vote on a ceasefire in Gaza. Wed, 21 Feb 2024 20:54:10 GMT Y6IF6V5RQFIVXML67HY7IFUR6M https://www.reuters.com/world/uk/uk-parliament-descends-into-chaos-over-gaza-ceasefire-vote-2024-02-21/Andrew Macaskill, Kylie Maclellan世界英国
Venezuela’s Maduro conveys 'great respect' for Guyana presidentVenezuela President Nicolas Maduro has conveyed his "great respect" to the Guyana President Mohamed Irfaan Ali, Guyana’s Ministry of Foreign Affairs said on Wednesday, signaling a decrease in tensions over an area where Guyana is developing large oil and gas reserves. Wed, 21 Feb 2024 20:42:16 GMT MM6OXKW3FJPCDP63CKC5IMPM6I https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/venezuelas-maduro-conceys-great-respect-guyana-president-2024-02-21/Sabrina Valle世界美洲
US urges Pakistan to lift internet shutdowns, social media restrictionsThe U.S. State Department on Wednesday condemned internet shutdowns in Pakistan, including restrictions on social media platforms, and urged the Pakistani government to lift such restrictions. Wed, 21 Feb 2024 20:05:28 GMT 3WCSHY2MMZLMFFFEHOU37HHDEY https://www.reuters.com/world/us-urges-pakistan-lift-internet-shutdowns-social-media-restrictions-2024-02-21/Humeyra Pamuk, Kanishka Singh世界
Israel intensifies strikes on Gaza's Rafah, killing large family in homeIsrael intensified its bombardment of Rafah in Gaza's south and over a dozen members of one family were killed in an air strike, residents said, as the ruined Palestinian enclave's health ministry announced 29,313 deaths in the war so far. Wed, 21 Feb 2024 19:34:43 GMT TNZ2LY76CNJADOVZDEDRINCB4E https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/israel-intensizes-strikes-gazas-rafah-large-family-killed-home-2024-02-21/Bassam Masoud, Ibraheem Abu Mustafa, Nidal Al-Mughrabi世界中东
US senators say it is 'urgent' for Hezbollah-Israel war to de-escalate soonThe Israeli military and Hezbollah have a window to de-escalate tensions along Lebanon's southern border before a possible Israeli military offensive against the Lebanese armed group, two Democratic U.S. senators told Reuters on Wednesday. Wed, 21 Feb 2024 19:09:25 GMT DOCF7LSMRRI5PFBH6IWD5IO5SE https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/us-senators-say-it-is-urgent-hezbollah-israel-war-de-escalate-soon-2024-02-21/Maya Gebeily世界中东
